page.title: 09Family Life.
page.content: {A day in the life of Nicola Gibson. Today I woke of my own accord at 7.30. and dressed for school.My uniform is blue and grey with a blue and gold tie.I then have my breakfast, coffee and cornflakes.Whilst I go and wash and clean my teeth mummy makes my packlunch,sandwiches,yoghurt,biscuit and apple.At 8.45. I set off for school.Mrs.Goodfellow is the teacher of class 4 and this morning after assembly we have Reading to Some Purpose and maths.At 12.00. I eat my packedlunch, and after playtime for a while I change into my shorts and T-shirt for the Inter_School Sports.At home again,after school,I read until my favourite dinner of chicken,vegetables and gravy then I watch T.V.until bedtime at 8.30.
